home.about: Simplify control of your finances, maintaining control over your expenses and investments in a convenient and effective way.

project.title: About the project
project.text1: This project is intended to help you organize your finances
project.text2: With a simple way to create the registers of expenses and amounts
project.text3: Freely create your registers with freedom to delete and update them

tech.title: Technologies
tech.text1: Project created using Vue.js in its latest version
tech.text4: Free and open source project for consultation and study
tech.text5: If you want to collaborate, go to
tech.text7: Feel free to help with development.

objective.title: Objetives
objective.text1: Assist in the organization of expenses, entry of values and investments
objective.text2: Help with the visibility and completeness of your financial health

contact.title: Contact
contact.text1: If you have any feedback or need help

register.deleteMsg: Do you want delete this {name} register with value {value}?

name.less: Name must be less than 15 characters

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy of Wallet Digitalz
privacy_policy.intro: This monetary management application is developed and provided by Criar.Art Tecnologia (hereinafter referred to as "we", "our", or "Criar.Art").

info_collected.title: Information We Collect
info_collected.content: When you use Wallet Digitalz, we do not collect or store your personal information on our servers. All information entered into the app is stored locally on your device and is encrypted to ensure the security and privacy of your data.

data_responsibility.title: Data Responsibility
data_responsibility.content: We are not responsible for the data entered into Wallet Digitalz. It is your sole responsibility to ensure the accuracy, security, and privacy of the data you enter and store in the app.

information_usage.title: Use of Information
information_usage.content: The information entered into Wallet Digitalz is for your personal use only and will not be shared with third parties. We use appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.

privacy_policy_changes.title: Privacy Policy Changes
privacy_policy_changes.content: This privacy policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in information practices. We recommend that you review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or Wallet Digitalz, please contact us at the following email address:
